description: Lists all related-item resources associated with a Systems Manager OpsCenter OpsItem. OpsCenter is a tool in Amazon Web Services Systems Manager.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more OpsItem filters. Use a filter to return a more specific list of results. (dict) --- Describes a filter for a specific list of related-item resources. The name of the filter key. Supported values include ResourceUri, ResourceType, or AssociationId. The values for the filter. (string) --- The operator used by the filter call. The only supported operator is EQUAL.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The name of the filter key. Supported values include ResourceUri, ResourceType, or AssociationId.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator used by the filter call. The only supported operator is EQUAL.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.

nested_items.name: Summaries
nested_items.description: A list of related-item resources for the specified OpsItem.

nested_items.name: ResourceUri
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related-item resource.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user or resource that created an OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM entity that created the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the related-item association was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user or resource that created an OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM entity that created the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time the related-item association was last updated.
